Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

Model Reference¶

Model¶

class model.base_model.BaseModel(*args, **kwds)¶

Base model for all anno models.

class model.anno.Anno(*args, **kwds)¶

This class represents Annotation Model(in datastore).

to_response_message()¶

Convert anno model to AnnoResponseMessage.

to_response_message_by_projection(projection)¶

convert anno model to AnnoResponseMessage by projection.

classmethod insert_anno(message, user)¶

create a new anno model from request message.

merge_from_message(message)¶

populate current anno with non-null fields in request message.(used in merge)

creator isn’t update-able.

classmethod query_by_country(app_name, user)¶

Query annos for a given app by country alphabetical order. No pagination is supported here.

classmethod query_by_recent(limit, offset, search_string, app_name, app_set, user)¶

This method queries anno records by ‘recent’ order. ‘recent’ = created :param limit how many anno records to query. :param offset query offset which represents starting from which anno record. :param search_string search string which partial-matches to anno_text. :param app_name app name which full-matches to app_name, this parameter is a single app name, not an app list. :param app_set app name set.

classmethod query_by_popular(limit, offset, search_string, app_name, app_set, user)¶

This method queries anno records by ‘popular’ order. ‘popular’ = vote_count - flag_count :param limit how many anno records to query. :param offset query offset which represents starting from which anno record. :param search_string search string which partial-matches to anno_text. :param app_name app name which full-matches to app_name, this parameter is a single app name, not an app list. :param app_set app name set.

classmethod query_by_active(limit, offset, search_string, app_name, app_set, user)¶

This method queries anno records by ‘active’ order. ‘active’ = last_update_time :param limit how many anno records to retrieve :param offset query offset which represents starting from which anno record. :param search_string search string which partial-matches to anno_text. :param app_name app name which full-matches to app_name, this parameter is a single app name, not an app list. :param app_set app name set.

classmethod get_query_string(search_string, app_name, app_set)¶

This method returns search query string based on the given search_string and app_name. :param search_string: search string which partial-matches to anno_text. :param app_name: app name which full-matches to app_name, this parameter is a single app name, not an app list. :param app_set: app name set.

classmethod get_query_string_for_field(field, words)¶

This method generates query string for a certain field against the given words.

classmethod get_query_string_for_all_fields(fields, words)¶

This method generates query string for different fields against the given words. :param fields: different field names. As for now, we only support anno_text and app_name. :param words: tokens to match

generate_search_document()¶

This method generates a search document filled with current anno information.

classmethod query_anno_by_author(user)¶

This methods return all annos created by the given user.

class model.user.User(*args, **kwds)¶

Represents user entity.

class model.follow_up.FollowUp(*args, **kwds)¶

Follow up data model.

to_message()¶

Convert FollowUp data model to follow up message.

class model.flag.Flag(*args, **kwds)¶

Flag data model.

to_message()¶

Convert Flag data model to flag message.

class model.vote.Vote(*args, **kwds)¶

Vote data model.

to_message()¶

Convert Vote data model to vote message.

class model.appinfo.AppInfo(*args, **kwds)¶

This class represents a 3rd party app information.
